verses.verse: Why,<WG3606> holy<WG40> brothers,<WG80> partakers<WG3353> of the heavenly<WG2032> calling,<WG2821> consider<WG2657> the Apostle<WG652> and High<WG749> Priest<WG749> of our profession,<WG3671> Christ<WG5547> Jesus;<WG2424>
Who was faithful<WG4103> to him that appointed<WG4160> him, as also<WG2532> Moses<WG3475> was faithful in all<WG3650> his house.<WG3624>

For this<WG3778> man was counted<WG515> worthy<WG515> of more<WG4119> glory<WG1391> than<WG3844> Moses,<WG3475> inasmuch<WG2596> <WG3745> as he who has built<WG2680> the house<WG3624> has<WG2192> more<WG4119> honor<WG5092> than the house.<WG3624>
For every<WG3956> house<WG3624> is built<WG2680> by some<WG5100> man; but he that built<WG2680> all<WG3956> things is God.<WG2316>
And Moses<WG3475> truly<WG3303> was faithful<WG4103> in all<WG3650> his house,<WG3624> as a servant,<WG2324> for a testimony<WG3142> of those<WG3588> things which were to be spoken<WG2980> after;

But Christ<WG5547> as a son<WG5207> over<WG1909> his own<WG848> house;<WG3624> whose<WG3739> house<WG3624> are we, if<WG1437> we hold<WG2722> fast<WG2722> the confidence<WG3954> and the rejoicing<WG2745> of the hope<WG1680> firm<WG949> to the end.<WG5056>
Why<WG1352> (as the Holy<WG40> Ghost<WG4151> said,<WG3004> To day<WG4594> if<WG1437> you will hear<WG191> his voice,<WG5456>
Harden<WG4645> not your<WG5216> hearts,<WG2588> as in the provocation,<WG3894> in the day<WG2250> of temptation<WG3986> in the wilderness:<WG2048>
When<WG3756> your<WG5216> fathers<WG3962> tempted<WG3985> me, proved<WG1381> me, and saw<WG1492> my works<WG2041> forty<WG5062> years.<WG2094>
Why<WG1352> I was grieved<WG4360> with that generation,<WG1074> and said,<WG2036> They do always<WG104> err<WG4105> in their heart;<WG2588> and they have not known<WG1097> my ways.<WG3598>
So<WG5613> I swore<WG3660> in my wrath,<WG3709> They shall not enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> my rest.<WG2663>)
Take heed,<WG991> brothers,<WG80> lest<WG3379> there be in any<WG5100> of you an evil<WG4190> heart<WG2588> of unbelief,<WG570> in departing<WG868> from the living<WG2198> God.<WG2316>

But exhort<WG3870> one<WG1438> another<WG1438> daily,<WG2596> <WG1538> <WG2250> while<WG891> <WG3739> it<WG3588> is called<WG2564> Today;<WG4594> lest<WG3363> any<WG5100> of<WG1537> you<WG5216> be hardened<WG4645> through the deceitfulness<WG539> of sin.<WG266>
For we are made<WG1096> partakers<WG3353> of Christ,<WG5547> if<WG1437> we hold<WG2722> the beginning<WG746> of our confidence<WG5287> steadfast<WG949> to the end;<WG5056>
While<WG1722> <WG3588> it is said,<WG3004> To day<WG4594> if<WG1437> you will hear<WG191> his voice,<WG5456> harden<WG4645> not your<WG5216> hearts,<WG2588> as in the provocation.<WG3894>
For some,<WG5100> when they had heard,<WG191> did provoke:<WG3893> however,<WG235> not all<WG3956> that came<WG1831> out of Egypt<WG125> by Moses.<WG3475>
But with whom<WG5101> was he grieved<WG4360> forty<WG5062> years?<WG2094> was it not with them that had sinned,<WG264> whose<WG3739> carcasses<WG2966> fell<WG4098> in the wilderness?<WG2048>
And to whom<WG5101> swore<WG3660> he that they should not enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> his rest,<WG2663> but to them that believed<WG544> not?
So<WG2532> we see<WG991> that they could<WG1410> not enter<WG1525> in because<WG1223> of unbelief.<WG570>
